title: BRIEF-City Chic Collective Says U.S. Bankruptcy Court Approved Acquisition Of Avenue's Assets
text:
BRIEF-City Chic Collective Says U.S. Bankruptcy Court Approved Acquisition Of Avenue's Assets

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 12:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-City Chic Collective Says U.S. Bankruptcy Court Approved Acquisition Of Avenue's Assets Oct 8 (Reuters) - City Chic Collective Ltd : * U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVED CO'S ACQUISITION OF E-COMMERCE ASSETS OF AVENUE STORES, LLC FOR US$16.5M * TRANSACTION WILL BE FINANCED FROM CASH & CREDIT FACILITIES, AND AN ADDITIONAL A$12.5M 12-MONTH FACILITY

BRIEF-City Chic Collective Says U.S. Bankruptcy Court Approved Acquisition Of Avenue's Assets
